name: attendance-app-root
description: Root package for the attendance app

scripts.build: ls -la && mkdir -p deploy-app && ls -la app && cp -r client/* deploy-app/ && cp vite.config.ts deploy-app/ && cp client/index.html deploy-app/ && cd deploy-app && npm init -y && npm install express vite esbuild && npx vite build && mkdir -p dist && npx esbuild ../app/index.js --platform=node --bundle --format=cjs --outfile=dist/server.js && cp ../app/index.js dist/index.js
